requirements.summary: Verify and ensure the deployment process completes successfully with proper error handling and logging
acceptanceCriteria: The deployment process is re-initiated successfully
Any deployment errors are properly logged and reported
The application is accessible after successful deployment

file_operations.description: Add error boundary and deployment verification logging to catch and report any initialization failures during app bootstrap
Enhance actor initialization error handling with detailed logging for connection failures, authentication errors, and admin initialization issues
Add comprehensive error logging for Internet Identity authentication failures, delegation errors, and session persistence issues
Create a deployment status indicator component that displays connection health, backend availability, and authentication readiness for deployment verification
Add deployment verification checks on app initialization and display the DeploymentStatus component in development mode to confirm successful deployment
